description: Defines a Flutter widget 'NoteListItem' that displays note information within a list, including title, content, and icons for pinned/archived status, with context menu options for actions like pin, archive, and delete.

classes.name: NoteListItem
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a list item for a note, showing title, content preview, and action icons.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the note list item, including layout, icons, and contextual menu.
